title: Modern Watch Face
description: Modern Watch Face is one beautiful and unusual watch face for your smartwatch. Ambient mode supported! Round and square watches supported! Themes included!
descriptionHTML: Modern Watch Face is one beautiful and unusual watch face for your smartwatch. Ambient mode supported! Round and square watches supported! Themes included!
comments: A very nice watchface. We asked for a darker theme and the author delivered. Now if we could get custom colorsâ€¦ ðŸ˜‰
I wish it had white on a black background, and a weather option. Other than that, it's very nice.

Very nice watch face. I like the design on this. Definitely a modern take of the analog design that's much easier to quickly read than a standard analog watch. It could use a few visual improvements such as more legible text, filling the entire watch face, and user customizable colors.
